locales.loc.vortex_editor_install: Install a new version of the Editor

locales.loc.description: We re glad to see you here. This software is an installation wizard that can help you install the Vortex Launcher. The Vortex Launcher is a powerful tool designed to assist you in managing projects, modules, plugins, and content. After installation, you will be able to create your projects and explore all the amazing features and capabilities that Vortex provides. Enjoy your experience!

locales.loc.error.no_internet_and_builtin: Error: Network usage is disabled and there no builtin launcher. Cannot proceed with installation.

locales.loc.install.description: Install Vortex Launcher from repository, or from this local installer

locales.loc.install.no_internet: No internet connexion, you need to have a built-in launcher.

locales.loc.install.no_builtin: No builtin launcher, you need to have a internet connexion.

locales.loc.install.builder_is_older: The built-in launcher is older or innexistant. We recommend using insternet to download the latest version.

locales.loc.install.builder_is_newer: The built-in launcher is newer. We recommend using it to get better performances.

locales.loc.install.install_path: Path where Vortex will be installed

locales.loc.install.install_summary: Install Vortex Launcher from repository, or from this local installer

locales.loc.install.offline_mode: Offline mode, the web installation is not available.

locales.loc.install.wait_fetch: Waiting to fetch online Vortex Launcher versions, please wait.

locales.loc.install.install_path_already_exist: CAUTION : The installation directory already exist. This installation will erase everything !

locales.loc.install.erase_and_install: Erase the folder and install Vortex

locales.loc.vxinstall.summary: This utility allows you to install a version of Vortex so you can open your projects and run your plugins and modules. Once installed, you will be able to launch any project for the following version:

locales.loc.vxinstall.choose_target_folder: Please choose an installation location from the folders that can contain Vortex versions on your system.

locales.loc.vxuninstall.summary: This software will help you to uninstall vortex editor versions

locales.loc.vxuninstall.delete_action: This action will delete the current Vortex Editor regitered at

locales.loc.update.explain_is_updated: The launcher is already to the latest version !

locales.loc.update.explain_can_update: A new Vortex Launcher version is available, you can download and install it now !

locales.loc.update.explain_no_internet: You need a valid internet connexion to verify and download new version from this utility, but you can still install a new version of the Vortex Editor and update it manually.

locales.loc.uninstall.summary: This software will help you to uninstall vortex (and optionnally Vortex local data).

locales.loc.uninstall.checkbox_uninstall_launche: This action will delete the current Vortex Launcher regitered at

locales.loc.uninstall.checkbox_uninstall_version: This action will delete the current Vortex versions installed and regitered by default at

locales.loc.uninstall.checkbox_uninstall_datas_s: This action will delete all data from your .vx folder (WARNING: this will delete all modules, plugins, contents & configs registered here.)

locales.loc.uninstall.versions_deletion: All versions of Vortex will be deleted.

locales.loc.uninstall.datas_deletion: All datas of Vortex will be deleted.
